original_text: Heman worked with his relative, Asaph. Asaph was Heman's helper. He was Berekiah's son. Berekiah was Shimea's son.
korean_text: 헤만의 형제 아삽은 헤만의 오른쪽에서 직무를 행하였으니 그는 베레갸의 아들이요 베레갸는 시므아의 아들이요

sentences.original_text: Heman worked with his relative, Asaph.
sentences.korean_translation: 헤만은 그의 친척인 아살과 함께 일했습니다.
